text: Loba: Tondimi na Allah, mpe tondimi na maye makitisameli biso, ndenge moko na maye makitisamaki epai na Ibrâhîm, na Ismâïl, na Is’hâq, mpe Ya’qûb mpe mabota, tondimi mpe na maye mapesamaki epai na Mûssa mpe Issa mpe bantoma, kowuta epai na Nkolo na bango, tokotia bokeseni moko te kati na bango, mpe epai naye nde to misoki
